name: ScrewUp
description:
In this game, you found yourself on the deserted island. You have to find a way to survive on this island full of danger.

Use everything around you to make tools to increases your chances to survive.
Many treasure waiting for you to take that can help you in your journey.
You can try to survive alone or together with your friends.


























- Open World adventure on the deserted islands.

- Craft useful tools to increase your chances of survival.

- Many dangerous creature may attack you anytime.

- Multiplayer with 2 or more player.

- Friendly-Fire is alway on, beware of your 'friend', they can be your demise.
